description: An otter named Ludwig is safe and well after being rescued from beneath a fast-moving conveyor belt at a nickel factory.
title: Ludwig the otter rescued from Swansea nickel refinery
title_page: Ludwig the otter rescued from Swansea nickel refinery - BBC News
maintext:
On a quest to get home, a night of fun becomes a dangerous battle...
Celebs welcome Alison Hammond for a sleepover
